description: Spectacular 3,948 sq. ft. residence at Trump Tower featuring 3 bedrooms plus den, 4.5 baths, and soaring 11-15' ceilings. Designed for both grand entertaining and comfortable everyday living, this home showcases breathtaking north, east, and west views of the city, lake, and river through expansive floor-to-ceiling windows. The open floor plan highlights oversized white porcelain tile flooring, three custom fireplaces, and a built-in audio system. The chef's kitchen boasts Italian Sossa Tuscan cabinetry, vintage granite countertops, dual Sub-Zero refrigerators, a spacious island with power access, stainless steel sink, and dual illuminated, temperature-controlled wine cellars. The primary suite includes a sitting area with fireplace, den/office space, two luxurious spa-inspired baths, and dual custom walk-in closets. Additional bedrooms are generously sized, each with en-suite baths. A refined powder room features designer wall treatments, premium finishes, and Toto fixtures. Ample storage is found throughout the home. Residents enjoy access to world-class building amenities including the exclusive health club and spa, 5-star hotel services, and pet-friendly living. Offered furnished, with two parking spaces available and storage locker included. (Dining room chandelier excluded.)
